name: vectordb (epsilla-cloud)
description: [项目级] Epsilla is a high performance Vector Database Management System。来源: https://github.com/epsilla-cloud/vectordb

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Epsilla is a high performance Vector Database Management System

来源: https://github.com/epsilla-cloud/vectordb
语言: C++
Stars: 871

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
docker pull epsilla/vectordb
docker run --pull=always -d -p 8888:8888 -v /data:/data epsilla/vectordb

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
VERSION
engine
engine/.dockerignore
engine/.gitignore
engine/CMakeLists.txt
engine/Dockerfile
engine/Dockerfile.embed

engine/config

engine/logger

engine/test.sh

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
* High performance and production-scale similarity search for embedding vectors.

* Full fledged database management system with familiar database, table, and field concepts. Vector is just another field type.

* Metadata filtering.

* Hybrid search with a fusion of dense and sparse vectors.

* Built-in embedding support, with natural language in natural language out search experience.

* Cloud native architecture with compute storage separation, serverless, and multi-tenancy.

* Rich ecosystem integrations including LangChain and LlamaIndex.

* Python/JavaScript/Ruby clients, and REST API int
